title: [GAMEPLAY] Sion - Ascension Invincibility Bug
body:
On Sion in the gamemode Ascension, when Sion collects the Ascended Power Up, while in passive, Sion will collect the power up, stay alive and be invincible until he uses his trinket to teleport.

    1. Defeat the Ascended Xerath.
    2. Die.
    3. While in passive, collect the Power Up.
    4. Complete Invincibilty. {{champion:6}}

replies.body:
Hey there!

We've seen the reports of this issue and are looking into it, but haven't been able to fully reproduce just yet.
Thank you for sending this in!

If you are still trying to recreate it, it appears to have something to do with him ulting right before/?after? dying. Here is my experience of the bug. i reported it yesterday and was able to capture the replay. Hope this helps!
